name: @Cyreslab-AI/shodan-mcp-server
description: Access Shodan's API to enhance your AI assistant's capabilities. Query detailed information about internet-connected devices and services to bolster cybersecurity research and threat intelligence. Simplify your data retrieval with advanced search functionalities and result summarization.

tools.name: get_host_info
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific IP address

fields.description: List of fields to include in the results (e.g., ['ip_str', 'ports', 'location.country_name'])

max_items.description: Maximum number of items to include in arrays (default: 5)

tools.name: search_shodan
tools.description: Search Shodan's database for devices and services

facets.description: List of facets to include in the search results (e.g., ['country', 'org'])

fields.description: List of fields to include in the results (e.g., ['ip_str', 'ports', 'location.country_name'])

max_items.description: Maximum number of items to include in arrays (default: 5)

summarize.description: Whether to return a summary of the results instead of the full data (default: false)

tools.name: scan_network_range
tools.description: Scan a network range (CIDR notation) for devices

fields.description: List of fields to include in the results (e.g., ['ip_str', 'ports', 'location.country_name'])

max_items.description: Maximum number of items to include in results (default: 5)

tools.name: get_ssl_info
tools.description: Get SSL certificate information for a domain

domain.description: Domain name to look up SSL certificates for (e.g., example.com)

tools.name: search_iot_devices
tools.description: Search for specific types of IoT devices

country.description: Optional country code to limit search (e.g., 'US', 'DE')

max_items.description: Maximum number of items to include in results (default: 5)

device_type.description: Type of IoT device to search for (e.g., 'webcam', 'router', 'smart tv')

tools.name: get_host_count
tools.description: Get the count of hosts matching a search query without consuming query credits

query.description: Shodan search query to count hosts for

facets.description: List of facets to include in the count results (e.g., ['country', 'org'])

tools.name: list_search_facets
tools.description: List all available search facets that can be used with Shodan queries

tools.name: list_search_filters
tools.description: List all available search filters that can be used in Shodan queries

tools.name: parse_search_tokens
tools.description: Parse a search query to understand which filters and parameters are being used

query.description: Shodan search query to parse and analyze

tools.name: list_ports
tools.description: List all ports that Shodan crawls on the Internet

tools.name: list_protocols
tools.description: List all protocols that can be used when performing on-demand Internet scans

tools.name: get_api_info
tools.description: Get information about your API plan including credits and limits

tools.name: get_my_ip
tools.description: Get your current IP address as seen from the Internet

tools.name: dns_lookup
tools.description: Resolve hostnames to IP addresses using DNS lookup

tools.name: reverse_dns_lookup
tools.description: Get hostnames for IP addresses using reverse DNS lookup

ips.description: List of IP addresses to lookup (e.g., ['8.8.8.8', '1.1.1.1'])

tools.name: get_domain_info
tools.description: Get comprehensive domain information including subdomains and DNS records

type.description: DNS record type filter (A, AAAA, CNAME, NS, SOA, MX, TXT)

tools.name: get_account_profile
tools.description: Get account profile information including membership status and credits

tools.name: get_cve_info
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific CVE

tools.name: search_cves
tools.description: Search for vulnerabilities with various filters

skip.description: Number of results to skip for pagination (default: 0)

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return (default: 10)

is_kev.description: Filter for Known Exploited Vulnerabilities only

product.description: Product name to search for vulnerabilities (e.g., 'apache', 'windows')

end_date.description: End date for filtering CVEs (YYYY-MM-DD format)

start_date.description: Start date for filtering CVEs (YYYY-MM-DD format)

sort_by_epss.description: Sort results by EPSS score (Exploit Prediction Scoring System)

tools.name: get_cpes
tools.description: Get Common Platform Enumeration (CPE) information for products

skip.description: Number of results to skip for pagination (default: 0)

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return (default: 10)

tools.name: get_newest_cves
tools.description: Get the newest vulnerabilities from the CVE database

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return (default: 10)

tools.name: get_kev_cves
tools.description: Get Known Exploited Vulnerabilities (KEV) from CISA

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return (default: 10)

tools.name: get_cves_by_epss
tools.description: Get CVEs sorted by EPSS score (Exploit Prediction Scoring System)

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return (default: 10)
